column4: Hi, I'm having problems configuring shares between ubuntu a windows, could anyone help?. I'm getting "Host seems to be down" but when I ping the windows box, it's returning packets
I have no idea what to do with that package
I thought all you had to do is install it?
I still get host down. By the way, I disabled the firewall on my windows box
Still getting host down when I try to mount it, any ideas?
well winbind will only help ubuntu find the windows box.  when I have tried to connect to windows xp I need to have a windows account with a password to get it to work
I do have the credentials, how do you connect to it
are you shareing the files from the windows account with the password?
well I'm not a windows guy,  I share my files for windows users on my ubuntu
Oh ok, thanks for the help anyway!
I've had too many problems like you now have, and it has gotten worse in vista and win 7
after all that I missed what version the windows side is?
